Trade/Device Name(s): Immunalysis SEFRIA Fentanyl Urine Enzyme Immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immunalysis SEFRIA Fentanyl Urine Enzyme Immunoassay and Fentanyl Urine Calibrators for qualitative detection of fentanyl in urine using automated clinical chemistry analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative laboratory test for the detection of fentanyl in human urine with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; provides preliminary results for prescription use, with mass spectrometry recommended for confirmation.
